original_text: Do not neglect your gift, which was given you through prophecy when the body of elders laid their hands on you.
korean_text: 네 속에 있는 은사 곧 장로의 회에서 안수 받을 때에 예언을 통하여 받은 것을 가볍게 여기지 말며

sentences.korean_translation: 네가 받은 은사를 경히 여기지 말라

sentences.original_text: which was given you through prophecy
when the body of elders laid their hands on you.
